2 LIST

Base styles/objects. Mostly global, tag-based selector rules.

2.1 Base

Default styling for all types of list.

  • List item
  • List item
    • List item
    • List item
    • List item
  • List item
  1. List item
  2. List item
  3. List item
Def term
Def description
Def term
Def description
<ul>
 <li>List item</li>
 <li>List item
     <ul>
         <li>List item</li>
         <li>List item</li>
         <li>List item</li>
     </ul>
 </li>
 <li>List item</li>
</ul>
<ol>
 <li>List item</li>
 <li>List item</li>
 <li>List item</li>
</ol>
<dl>
 <dt>Def term</dt>
 <dd>Def description</dd>
 <dt>Def term</dt>
 <dd>Def description</dd>
</dl>

2.2 Unstyled

Removes bullet points and default left spacing.

  • List item
  • List item
  • List item
<ul class="list-unstyled">
 <li>List item</li>
 <li>List item</li>
 <li>List item</li>
</ul>

2.3 Numbered

Adds numerical index to each item in the list. Should only be applied to <ol> lists.

  1. List item
  2. List item
  3. List item
<ol class="list-numbered">
 <li>List item</li>
 <li>List item</li>
 <li>List item</li>
</ol>

2.4 Blocky

Creates standard "blocky" navigation. Useful for sub navigation lists and such like.

  • Block List Item
  • Block List Item
  • Block List Item
  • Block List Item
<ul class="list-blocky">
 <li><a href="/" class="list-blocky__link">Block List Item</a></li>
 <li><a href="/" class="list-blocky__link">Block List Item</a></li>
 <li><a href="/" class="list-blocky__link">Block List Item</a></li>
 <li><a href="/" class="list-blocky__link">Block List Item</a></li>
</ul>
Created using kss-node and kss-node-template.
